definitions.definition: To twist one's body with snakelike motions .
examples: The prisoner managed to squirm out of the straitjacket.

definitions.definition: To twist in discomfort , especially from shame or embarrassment .
examples: I recounted the embarrassing story in detail just to watch him squirm .

definitions.definition: To evade a question, an interviewer etc. (Can we add an example for this sense?)

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To twist one's body with snakelike motions .
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To twist in discomfort , especially from shame or embarrassment .
To evade a question, an interviewer etc. (Can we add an example for this sense?)
